creator: haeberling@privasphere.com
text:
Some assertions (see Bug 38387) need the whole MIME message and not just some headers of the message.

As storing the whole MIME message may become a memory issue for some test scenarios, add a flag in the MailReaderSampler to enable/disable this.

creator: haeberling@privasphere.com
text:
Created attachment 22164
Patch for the MailReaderSampler


Created a patch that adds a storeMimeMessage property to the MailReaderSampler.
If it is set, then the each child sampler result will store the MIME representation of the message in the responseData field.
